cast.name: 比安卡·德·里奥 Bianca Del Rio

trans_title: 鲁保罗变装皇后秀 第六季
introduction: The sixth season of RuPaul's Drag Race will begin airing February 24, 2014. Like the fifth season, this season will feature 14 contestants competing for the title of "America's Next Drag Superstar". For the first time in the show's history, the season premiere is split into two parts; the fourteen queens are split into two groups and compete against each other before being reunited as one group for the second episode.Santino Rice and Michelle Visage are back as judges at the panel. Two new pitcrew members, Miles Moody and Simon Sherry-Wood, also have been introduced and will join the current pitcrew members, Jason Carter and Shawn Morales.The winner of this season will walk away with a prize package that will include a supply from Colorevolution Cosmetics and a cash prize of $100,000.
chinese_title: 鲁保罗变装皇后秀 第六季
